description:
If you need a functional, attractive website but don't have the money to hire a topnotch web developer, you've found the right course. Geared for both business websites and personal websites, Build a Wordpress Site from Start to Finish gives you the tools you need to create a website that looks great and works exactly the way you want it to. You'll learn how to structure menus, install themes, change your website's header, configure Wordpress settings, add widgets to your sidebar, install an image slider, and adjust your SEO settings to make your site search engine friendly.

No previous knowledge of Wordpress is required. The course can be completed in under 30 minutes.

The videos in this course never expire, and you may come back and watch them as many times as you need.
title: Build a Wordpress Site from Start to Finish
